availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Shadrach L. Mitchell (Lewis County, Kentucky, artist and soldier)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, artist and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Shadrach Mitchell and Elizabeth Mitchell. Resident of Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Artist in Lewis County in 1860. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as quartermaster and first lieutenant from March 23, 1863, to August 3, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 217A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 836.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0350.
Find A Grave, "Shadrach Lindsey "S.L." Mitchell (1838-1930)," Memorial #88255741, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88255741 (accessed August 13, 2020).
